arts.ttl: Vitória kick off UEFA Conference League campaign with 3-1 win over NK Celje
arts.sum: Vitória began the league phase of the UEFA Conference League in fine fashion with a 3-1 win against last season’s nemesis in the same competition NK Celje. The result flattered the Slovenian outfit. Goals by three of Vitória’s Silva’s – Samu, Gustavo and Tiago – got the job done, but the hosts missed a glut of chances to increase the score. Aljoša Matko scored a fine individual effort in stoppage time for Celje. More to follow.

arts.ttl: Preview: Vitoria de Guimaraes vs. Celje - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Europa Conference League clash between Vitoria de Guimaraes and Celje, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
